basic_resource_CL
| where server_name_s == '{serverName}' and database_name_s == '{databaseName}'
| sort  by TimeGenerated desc
| extend  properties = pack_all()
| take 1
| mv-apply key = keyList to typeof(string) on (
    project key = 
    case(
    key == "Edition_s", "Edition",
    key == "ResourceVersion_s", "ResourceVersion",
    key == "slo_name_s", "Service Level",
    key == "dtu_limit_d", "DTU",
    key == "cpu_count_d", "CPU Count",
    key == "cpu_rate_d", "CPU Rate (%)",
    key == "min_cores_d", "CPU Core (Min)",
    key == "cpu_limit_d", "CPU Limit (Core)",
    key == "max_cpu_d", "Max CPU (%)",
    key == "cap_cpu_d", "Cap CPU (%)",
    key == "instance_cap_cpu_d", "Instance Cap CPU (%)",
    key == "max_dop_d", "MAXDOP",
    key == "primary_group_max_workers_d", "Max Worker Thread",
    key == "max_sessions_d", "Max Session",
    key == "max_db_memory_d", "Max DB Memory (GB)",
    key == "visible_target_MB_d", "Target Memory (GB)",
    key == "sqlserver_start_time_t", "DB Start Time (UTC)",
    key == "primary_group_min_io_d", "Data IOPS (Min)",
    key == "primary_group_max_io_d", "Data IOPS (Max)",
    key == "primary_min_log_rate_d", "Log MB/sec (Min)",
    key == "primary_max_log_rate_d", "Log MB/sec (Max)",
    key
    )
    , value = case(
    key == "cpu_count_d", tostring(tolong(cpu_count_d)),
    key == "cpu_limit_d", tostring(tolong(cpu_limit_d)),
    key == "dtu_limit_d", tostring(tolong(dtu_limit_d)),
    key == "min_cores_d", tostring(tolong(min_cores_d)),
    key == "max_cpu_d", tostring(tolong(max_cpu_d)),
    key == "cap_cpu_d", tostring(tolong(cap_cpu_d)),
    key == "cpu_rate_d", tostring(tolong(cpu_rate_d)),
    key == "instance_cap_cpu_d", tostring(tolong(instance_cap_cpu_d)),
    key == "max_dop_d", tostring(tolong(max_dop_d)),
    key == "primary_group_max_workers_d", tostring(tolong(primary_group_max_workers_d)),
    key == "max_sessions_d", tostring(tolong(max_sessions_d)),
    key == "max_db_memory_d", tostring(todouble(max_db_memory_d / pow(1024,2))),
    key == "visible_target_MB_d", tostring(todouble(visible_target_MB_d / 1024)),
    key == "sqlserver_start_time_t", format_datetime(sqlserver_start_time_t, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"),
    key == "primary_group_min_io_d", tostring(tolong(primary_group_min_io_d)),
    key == "primary_group_max_io_d", tostring(tolong(primary_group_max_io_d)),
    key == "primary_min_log_rate_d", tostring(todouble(primary_min_log_rate_d / pow(1024,2))),
    key == "primary_max_log_rate_d", tostring(todouble(primary_max_log_rate_d / pow(1024,2))),
    tostring(properties[key])
    )
)
| project key, value
